description:
When Fallout 4 released in 2015, it received generally positive reviews from critics, but also sparked a discussion online picking apart the game. Many felt it was a good game, but a bad Fallout game. However, overtime, it seems reception to the game has warmed up. And - with the Next Gen patch recently releasing on April 25, 2024, the question is: Is Fallout 4 Worth Playing in 2024?

#fallout4 #fallout
title: Playing Fallout 4 In 2024
